description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: The 15th National Games Triathlon Competition - Traffic and Public Transport Arrangements
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 第十五屆全國運動會鐵人三項比賽 - 交通及公共運輸安排

2025-11-14T09:50:00.CONTENT_EN: The 15th National Games Triathlon Competition will be held this Saturday and Sunday (November 15 and 16). To facilitate the competition, road closures and temporary traffic diversions will be implemented in the vicinity of Central and Wan Chai North (including Expo Drive, Lung Wo Road, Yiu Sing Street, Lung Hop Street, and Lung Tat Path) and affected motorists should divert via Fleming Road, Connaught Road Central, Harcourt Road or Gloucester Road as appropriate. The traffic will be more congested when compared with normal Saturdays and Sundays. Motorists are advised to drive with care, and pay attention to the traffic signs erected at the scenes. Three franchised bus routes (Citybus route Nos. H1S, H2 and H3) passing through Lung Wo Road will be diverted from start of service on November 15 and 16. The bus stop located at the opposite side of Two International Finance Centre on Man Yiu Street will also be temporarily suspended due to the road closures. The relevant affected bus routes and bus stops will resume normal operation after roads re-open. In view of the restricted zones set up at waters off Wanchai during the competition, services of the ferry route traveling between Wan Chai and Tsim Sha Tsui is expected to be temporarily adjusted from around 7.50am to 8.20am and from around 10.35am to 11.05am on November 15, and from around 1.50pm to 2.10pm on November 16, subject to the actual circumstances. The route of Water Taxi departing at 1.55pm on November 16 from Tsim Sha Tsui East to Central will not stop at Wanchai. The Transport Department appeals to members of the public to plan their journey in advance and make use of public transport services as far as possible to avoid traffic congestion and unnecessary delays. During the event, the Police may adjust the traffic arrangements subject to the prevailing crowd and traffic conditions in the areas. Members of the public should pay attention to the latest traffic news through radio, television or the "HKeMobility" mobile application.
2025-11-14T09:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 第十五屆全國運動會鐵人三項項目將於本週六及週日(十一月十五及十六日)舉行。為配合比賽，中環及灣仔北一帶（包括博覽道、龍和道、耀星街、龍合街和龍達徑）會實施封路及臨時交通改道，受影響的駕駛者需改經菲林明道、干諾道中、夏慤道或告士打道。 屆時附近交通將會比平常的周六日較為擠塞，請駕駛人士小心駕駛及保持忍讓，及留意現場的交通標誌。 行經龍和道的三條專營巴士路線（城巴第H1S、H2及H3號線）在十一月十五及十六日，由首班車起改道行駛。位於民耀街國際金融中心二期對面的巴士站，亦會因應封路而暫停使用。相關巴士路線及巴士站將於道路重開後恢復正常運作。 　　因應賽事期間灣仔對開一帶水域設立的限制區域，來往灣仔及尖沙咀的渡輪航線預計在十一月十五日上午約七時五十分至八時二十分、上午約十時三十五分至十一時○五分；及十一月十六日下午約一時五十分至二時十分期間，或會視乎實際情況而作出短暫的臨時服務調整。水上的士於十一月十六日下午一時五十五分由尖沙咀東開出往中環的航班將不停灣仔。 　　運輸署呼籲市民及早計劃行程，盡量使用公共運輸服務，以避免交通擠塞及不必要的延誤。活動期間，警方將視乎當區一帶的人潮及交通情況，在有需要時調整有關交通安排。市民請留意電台、電視台或「香港出行易」流動應用程式發放的最新交通消息。

2025-11-16T17:30:00.CONTENT_EN: The road sections in the vicinity of Central and Wan Chai North which were temporarily closed to facilitate the 15th National Games Triathlon Competition are re-opened to all traffic. Relevant public transport services have resumed normal.
2025-11-16T17:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 為配合第十五屆全國運動會鐵人三項比賽於中環及灣仔北一帶臨時封閉的道路現已解封。相關公共運輸服務亦已恢復正常運作。

2025-11-16T10:36:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that the train service on the Kwun Tong Line is being affected because of a passenger on a train requiring urgent medical assistance at Mong Kok Station.
2025-11-16T10:36:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於旺角站列車上有乘客需要緊急醫療協助，觀塘綫的列車服務受到影響。

2025-11-16T10:44:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that the case of a passenger requiring urgent medical assistance on Kwun Tong Line has been resolved. Train service will be back to normal within a short period of time.
2025-11-16T10:44:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，較早前觀塘綫列車內有乘客需要緊急醫療服務的事件已經妥善處理，列車班次會逐步回復正常。

2025-11-16T13:14:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-11-16T13:14:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-11-18T11:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic measure is implemented on Lantau Link: The speed limit of Lantau Link is reduced to 50km/h. Ting Kau Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangement is implemented on Ting Kau Bridge: The speed limit of Ting Kau Bridge is reduced to 50km/h. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-11-18T11:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 青嶼幹線： 由於強風關係，青嶼幹線已實施下列臨時交通措施： 青嶼幹線的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 汀九橋： 由於強風關係，汀九橋已實施下列臨時交通措施： 汀九橋的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-11-18T14:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic measure is implemented on Lantau Link: The speed limit of Lantau Link is reduced to 50km/h. Ting Kau Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangement is implemented on Ting Kau Bridge: The speed limit of Ting Kau Bridge is reduced to 50km/h. Stonecutters Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangements are implemented on Stonecutters Bridge: The middle lanes of Stonecutters Bridge are closed. Only fast and slow lanes are opened to traffic. Speed limit is reduced to 50km/h. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-11-18T14:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 青嶼幹線： 由於強風關係，青嶼幹線已實施下列臨時交通措施： 青嶼幹線的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 汀九橋： 由於強風關係，汀九橋已實施下列臨時交通措施： 汀九橋的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 昂船洲大橋： 由於強風關係，昂船洲大橋已實施下列臨時交通措施： 昂船洲大橋的中線封閉，只餘快線及慢線開放予車輛行駛，車速限制降至每小時50公里。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-11-18T15:31:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link: The temporary speed limit arrangement which was implemented before in the Lantau Link is cancelled. Ting Kau Bridge: The temporary speed limit arrangement which was implemented before in the Ting Kau Bridge is cancelled. Stonecutters Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangements are implemented on Stonecutters Bridge: The middle lanes of Stonecutters Bridge are closed. Only fast and slow lanes are opened to traffic. Speed limit is reduced to 50km/h. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-11-18T15:31:00.CONTENT_CN: 青嶼幹線： 較早前於青嶼幹線實施的臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 汀九橋： 較早前於汀九橋實施的臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 昂船洲大橋： 由於強風關係，昂船洲大橋已實施下列臨時交通措施： 昂船洲大橋的中線封閉，只餘快線及慢線開放予車輛行駛，車速限制降至每小時50公里。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-11-18T17:02:00.CONTENT_EN: Stonecutters Bridge: The Middle lane closure and temporary speed limit arrangements which were implemented before in the Stonecutters Bridge are cancelled. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-11-18T17:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 昂船洲大橋： 較早前於昂船洲大橋實施的中線封閉及臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: MTR train service arrangements during football match at Kai Tak Sports Park
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 啟德體育園舉行足球賽事期間港鐵列車服務安排

2025-11-18T12:04:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Kai Tak Stadium will host another AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers football match tonight (18 November). Passengers can reach the venue from either Kai Tak or Sung Wong Toi stations. After the event, the train frequency will be enhanced as necessary.
2025-11-18T12:04:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 啟德主場館今晚(11月18日)再度舉行亞洲盃外圍賽。前往觀賞的乘客可使用啟德或宋皇臺站。 散場時，港鐵公司會按需要加密列車班次。

2025-11-18T17:23:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to malfunction of traffic lights at the junction of Wang Chiu Road and Sheung Yee Road, motorists are advised to drive with utmost care when passing through the road junction, pay extra attention to the traffic signs and safety of pedestrians. Pedestrians please pay attention to vehicles when crossing Tsui Ping Road with malfunctioned traffic lights.
2025-11-18T17:23:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於宏照道和常怡道交界的交通燈失靈，駕駛人士在駛經有關路口時，請加倍小心，注意交通標誌的指示並留意過路行人的安全。行人在交通燈失靈的翠屏道橫過馬路時，請特別注意車輛。

2025-11-18T18:06:00.CONTENT_EN: Traffic lights at the junction of Wang Chiu Road and Sheung Yee Road have resumed normal.
2025-11-18T18:06:00.CONTENT_CN: 位於宏照道和常怡道交界的交通燈已恢復正常運作。

2025-11-18T17:40:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic measure is implemented on Lantau Link: The speed limit of Lantau Link is reduced to 50km/h. Ting Kau Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangements are implemented on Ting Kau Bridge: The middle lanes of Ting Kau Bridge are closed. Only fast and slow lanes are opened to traffic. Speed limit is reduced to 50km/h. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
